"Hero Sword":
"When a Sword is equipped by a Hero, it performs \"Hero Sword\" attacks and PAs instead of normal Sword attacks.

Hero Sword is notable for its high-speed, wide-range attacks.

All Hero Sword PAs have additional effects that occur when holding the PA button, such as being able to be charged, or switching to other Hero weapons automatically."

"Hero Sword's Weapon Action fires \"Aura Bullets\", which can damage enemies and recover PP at medium range.

By holding the Weapon Action button, you can charge up and fire a more powerful Aura Bullet."
